Nov. 26, 2017 D Swiss National Championships (Excellence Section)
Swiss National Championships (Excellence Division) 0 Set Test and Own Choice Swiss National Championships swiss-national-championships-excellence-section European Championships The current Record Holder is Brass Band Treize Etoiles with 13 Titles in Excellence Division. Switzerland
Excellence
Eden
Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland Adjudicators Set Work (Nov 25th): David Childs, Ian Porthouse, Franz Matysiak Adjudicators Own Choice: Garry Cutt, Michael Fowles, Rieks van der Velde
(World)Premiere of: Concerto [Szentpali] and Inferno.
Special Prize: Best Trombone (Set Work): Valaisia Brass Band Special Prize (Own Choice): Bass trombone (Treize Etoiles)
